actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Congress encourages people throughout the Nation to hold an annual commemorative event on or near August 20th honoring Slavery Remembrance Day, featuring its Official Remembrance Program.
short_title: Original Slavery Remembrance Day Commemorative Remembrance Program Resolution
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

titles.title: Original Slavery Remembrance Day Commemorative Remembrance Program Resolution
Original Slavery Remembrance Day Commemorative Remembrance Program Resolution

Expressing the sense of Congress that Congress encourages people throughout the Nation to hold an annual commemorative event on or near August 20th honoring Slavery Remembrance Day, featuring its Official Remembrance Program.
